segments.text: I'm going to Bihai Park.Is this the right bus , please ?
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: No , you're going the wrong way . You want a 103 from Beijing Zoo .
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: How can I get it , please ?
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: You get off at the next stop , cross the street , and you'll find the stop not far on the right hand side .
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: Could I have a transfer please ?
segments.speaker: S1
